record.title: MEASURE READ THE FIRST TIME--H.R. 5715
record.narrative:
MEASURE READ THE FIRST TIME--H.R. 5715 -- (Senate - April 28, 2008)

[Page: S3454]

speaking.paragraph: I understand that H.R. 5715 has been received from the House and is at the desk. I would ask for its first reading.

record.chair: The clerk will report the bill by title.
The assistant legislative clerk read as follows:
A bill (H.R. 5715) to ensure continued availability of access to the Federal student loan program for students and families.

speaking.paragraph: I ask for its second reading and object to my own request.

record.chair: Objection having been heard, the bill will receive its second reading on the next legislative day.
